description: This file defines a Template class for rendering HTML snippets and UI elements for a to-do list application, including methods for generating list items, counters, and button labels.

classes.name: Template
classes.description: A class for generating HTML templates and UI components for a to-do list app.

methods.name: show
methods.description: Creates HTML string for list items based on data, replacing placeholders in a default template.

methods.name: itemCounter
methods.description: Returns a string displaying the number of active to-dos.

methods.name: clearCompletedButton
methods.description: Returns the label for the 'Clear completed' button based on the number of completed to-dos.
